Html:
Hi guys!

Im starting to work with the GoblinXNA today. I was following the user manual and i found a problem in the first step.

When i open the Tutorials.sln and try to build the solution, appears errors saying that the "GoblinXNA" doesnt exists("The referenced component 'GoblinXNA' could not be found" "The type or namespace name 'GoblinXNA' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)").

I tried to add that reference but i did not found in the GoblinXNA folder, can u guys help me?

Sorry for my stupid question and bad english, im just a beginner programmer trying to make a project for a crazy programing teacher!

 

Thanks u All!

You need to build GoblinXNA project in src/ first . Please follow the instruction guide.

Ohan
